name: node-kyber-1024
description: Post Quantum NodeJS interface for Kyber 1024.

scripts.build-docs: touch ./readme.md && rm ./readme.md && npx typedoc --toc --mode modules --theme markdown --out $INIT_CWD/docs --readme $INIT_CWD/readmeHeader/readhead.md $INIT_CWD/src && npx concat-md --decrease-title-levels ./docs > README.md

author: Anthony Ellison
